top_comments.comment:
"This is so Canadian"
Took the words straight out of my mouth
I like how Beccy wasn't just strategizing her appetizer, but the whole course meal.
alvin sounds especially quiet when shouting the amount of time left in the season 4 finale compared to the other ones.

no one:
masterchef finalists: *puts dessert elements (mousse, crumb, panna cotta) in appetizers*

"This dish is like my grandpa on a plate"
Me who is confused, "Ok.... Nice dish..... Good cooking... umm...."

comments_since_last_sample.body:
I love Claudio's reaction at having food thrown on him xD

Any person's reaction : "You clumsy moron, look at what you've done you donut!!!" 
Claudio's reaction : *YUM!* xD
